allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix evaluator to compute regression metrics in original scale

The evaluator was passing ScaledNumeric objects as y_true to sklearn
metrics, which failed. Now properly unwraps ScaledNumeric and applies
inverse transform so both y_true and y_pred are in original scale.

Also adds mse, mae, rmse to the metrics registry and new dependencies
\(pyarrow, sqlglot\) for upcoming SQL query support.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
